title: Andy Tait
text: Andrew Tait was a <a href="Scottish%20people">Scottish</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player during the late 1940s / early 1950s. He signed 'senior' with <a href="Dumbarton%20F.C.">Dumbarton</a> in December 1949 and was a regular in the team for four seasons. He signed for <a href="Dundee%20United%20F.C.">Dundee United</a> in September 1953.
